overview_of_class: This course will provide an introduction to health psychology. Topics covered will include adherence, seeking and receiving health care, stress and coping, pain, living with chronic illness, and the role of behavior for health and disease.
name: Health Psychology
title: WCAS PSYCH 248-0-20 Health Psychology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will provide an introduction to health psychology. Topics covered will include adherence, seeking and receiving health care, stress and coping, pain, living with chronic illness, and the role of behavior for health and disease.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Brannon, L., Feist, J., & Updegraff, J. A. (2014). Health Psychology: An Introduction to Behavior and Health (8th Edition). Belmont, CA: Wadsworth Publishing, Cengage Learning. ISBN: 978-1-133-59307-2

class_attributes:
Social & Behavioral Sciences Distro Area

Attendance at 1st class mandatory
subject: PSYCH
